name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Customer Engineer with over 10 years of experience delivering high-performance software solutions. Expert in **Jira Service Management** and adept in providing exceptional **customer service** and **helpdesk** support. Proficient in debugging, developing, and managing applications utilizing **JavaScript**, **Python**, and **SQL**, with hands-on expertise in **ETL** processes and **GraphQL** for efficient data handling. Skilled in cloud platforms including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **GCP**, ensuring robust deployments and integrations in various environments.

Experienced in building enterprise-grade solutions while maintaining high standards of documentation and collaboration. I bring a solid foundation in creating low-code applications and enhancing user experiences in the automotive sector. Passionate about leveraging technology to deliver impactful outcomes for customers and stakeholders.

•	Trained staff on best practices for customer interactions and technical troubleshooting to elevate overall service quality and user satisfaction ratings.
